channel.title: My Client needs sum fixn
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i283.photobucket.com/albums/kk310/silabgarza/clienthelp.gif[/img]
okay first, the mouse stuff on chatbox is weird, its the 317 gameframe stuff, im sure its a simple fix but im bad at clients....
second, clan chat, how i make it have its own tab? and when i click on it, shows clanchat tab
lastly, how i make it have the 474 gameframe buttons? i have clanchat working so like have clan work with that, if u need anymore info, just ask
msn if u need more info and cant wait: g_a_r_z_a@live.com
